AI.result: 在包含 4102 名患者 8675 次 CBCT 扫描的分割验证集上，DeepPriorCBCT 的诊断性能和整体图像质量与标准重建算法相当。在回顾性和前瞻性研究中，11 名医学专家和 25 名介入医师均认可重建图像的质量，而辐射暴露量则显著减少。
AI.conclusion: DeepPriorCBCT 为低剂量 CBCT 重建树立了新标准，有效降低了辐射风险并保证了诊断的准确性，在多中心和前瞻性临床试验中被证明具有良好的临床应用前景。

title: Feed-Forward 3D Gaussian Splatting Compression with Long-Context Modeling
summary: 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS) has emerged as a revolutionary 3D representation. However, its substantial data size poses a major barrier to widespread adoption. While feed-forward 3DGS compression offers a practical alternative to costly per-scene per-train compressors, existing methods struggle to model long-range spatial dependencies, due to the limited receptive field of transform coding networks and the inadequate context capacity in entropy models. In this work, we propose a novel feed-forward 3DGS compression framework that effectively models long-range correlations to enable highly compact and generalizable 3D representations. Central to our approach is a large-scale context structure that comprises thousands of Gaussians based on Morton serialization. We then design a fine-grained space-channel auto-regressive entropy model to fully leverage this expansive context. Furthermore, we develop an attention-based transform coding model to extract informative latent priors by aggregating features from a wide range of neighboring Gaussians. Our method yields a $20\times$ compression ratio for 3DGS in a feed-forward inference and achieves state-of-the-art performance among generalizable codecs.

AI.tldr: 提出了一个新颖的端到端3DGS压缩框架，该框架通过大规模包含数千个基于莫兰序列的高斯函数的上下文结构，以及细粒度的空间-通道自回归熵模型和基于注意力的变换编码模型，实现了高效压缩和广泛适用的3D表示。
AI.motivation: 现有的3DGS压缩方法在处理大规模数据时表现不佳，因为它们难以建模长距离的空间依赖关系，这限制了3DGS在实际应用中的推广。
AI.method: 提出了一种全新的端到端3DGS压缩框架，包括大规模上下文结构、细粒度的空间-通道自回归熵模型和基于注意力的变换编码模型。
AI.result: 该方法实现了20倍的3DGS压缩比，并在所有可推广的编解码器中达到了最先进的性能。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的方法为3D数据的有效压缩和广泛应用提供了一种新的解决方案。

title: Quantum-Inspired Spectral Geometry for Neural Operator Equivalence and Structured Pruning
comment: 6 pages, 1 figure, preliminary version; concepts and simulation experiments only
summary: The rapid growth of multimodal intelligence on resource-constrained and heterogeneous domestic hardware exposes critical bottlenecks: multimodal feature heterogeneity, real-time requirements in dynamic scenarios, and hardware-specific operator redundancy. This work introduces a quantum-inspired geometric framework for neural operators that represents each operator by its normalized singular value spectrum on the Bloch hypersphere. We prove a tight spectral-to-functional equivalence theorem showing that vanishing Fubini--Study/Wasserstein-2 distance implies provable functional closeness, establishing the first rigorous foundation for cross-modal and cross-architecture operator substitutability. Based on this metric, we propose Quantum Metric-Driven Functional Redundancy Graphs (QM-FRG) and one-shot structured pruning. Controlled simulation validates the superiority of the proposed metric over magnitude and random baselines. An extensive experimental validation on large-scale multimodal transformers and domestic heterogeneous hardware (Huawei Ascend, Cambricon MLU, Kunlunxin) hardware is deferred to an extended journal version currently in preparation.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种量子启发的几何框架，用于表示神经运算符，并建立了跨模态与跨架构运算符可替代性的严格基础。
AI.motivation: 解决资源受限和异构的家用硬件上快速发展的多模态智能所面临的瓶颈问题，包括多模态特征异质性、动态场景下实时要求以及硬件特定操作冗余。
AI.method: 研究引入了一种在Bloch超球体上以归一化奇异值谱表示每个运算符的量子启发的几何框架，并证明了谱到功能等价定理，基于该定理提出了量子度量驱动的功能冗余图和一次完成结构剪枝方法。
AI.result: 研究证明了所提度量在控制模拟中优于幅度和随机基线，并计划在大规模多模态变压器和家用异构硬件上进行广泛实验验证。
AI.conclusion: 研究为跨模态和跨架构运算符可替代性奠定了严格的理论基础，并展示了其在多模态和异构硬件环境中的潜在应用潜力。

title: Look, Recite, Then Answer: Enhancing VLM Performance via Self-Generated Knowledge Hints
summary: Vision-Language Models (VLMs) exhibit significant performance plateaus in specialized domains like precision agriculture, primarily due to "Reasoning-Driven Hallucination" where linguistic priors override visual perception. A key bottleneck is the "Modality Gap": visual embeddings fail to reliably activate the fine-grained expert knowledge already encoded in model parameters. We propose "Look, Recite, Then Answer," a parameter-efficient framework that enhances VLMs via self-generated knowledge hints while keeping backbone models frozen. The framework decouples inference into three stages: (1) Look generates objective visual descriptions and candidate sets; (2) Recite employs a lightweight 1.7B router to transform visual cues into targeted queries that trigger candidate-specific parametric knowledge; (3) Answer performs parallel evidence alignment between descriptions and recited knowledge to select the most consistent label. On AgroBench, our method achieves state-of-the-art results, improving Weed Identification accuracy by 23.6% over Qwen-VL and surpassing GPT-4o without external search overhead. This modular design mitigates hallucinations by transforming passive perception into active, controllable knowledge retrieval

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种参数高效框架 'Look, Recite, Then Answer'，旨在通过自动生成的知识提示增强视觉-语言模型(VLMs)，特别是在专门领域如精准农业中表现出显著效果，提高了杂草识别的准确性。
AI.motivation: 当前VLMs在特定领域如精准农业中表现受限于视觉感知和语言先验之间的'原因驱动式幻觉'问题，本文通过减少视觉嵌入和专家知识之间的差异来克服这一瓶颈。
AI.method: 该方法将推理过程分为三个阶段：Look，生成客观的视觉描述和候选集；Recite，利用轻量级路由器将视觉提示转化为针对性查询以触发特定候选的知识；Answer，对描述和知识提示进行并行对齐以选择最一致的标识。
AI.result: 在AgroBench数据集上，该方法超过了GPT-4o和Qwen-VL等模型，特别是在杂草识别任务上提高了23.6%的准确性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提出的方法通过模块化设计有效减少了视觉-语言模型中的幻觉现象，提高了模型在准确农业领域的应用性能。

title: HanDyVQA: A Video QA Benchmark for Fine-Grained Hand-Object Interaction Dynamics
summary: Hand-object interaction (HOI) inherently involves dynamics where human manipulations produce distinct spatio-temporal effects on objects. However, existing semantic HOI benchmarks focused either on manipulation or on the resulting effects at a coarse level, lacking fine-grained spatio-temporal reasoning to capture the underlying dynamics in HOI. We introduce HanDyVQA, a fine-grained video question-answering benchmark that comprehensively covers both the manipulation and effect aspects of HOI. HanDyVQA comprises six complementary question types (Action, Process, Objects, Location, State Change, and Object Parts), totalling 11.1K multiple-choice QA pairs. Collected QA pairs recognizing manipulation styles, hand/object motions, and part-level state changes. HanDyVQA also includes 10.3K segmentation masks for Objects and Object Parts questions, enabling the evaluation of object/part-level reasoning in video object segmentation. We evaluated recent video foundation models on our benchmark and found that even the best-performing model, Gemini-2.5-Pro, reached only 73% average accuracy, which is far from human performance (97%). Further analysis shows the remaining challenges in spatial relationship, motion, and part-level geometric understanding. We also found that integrating explicit HOI-related cues into visual features improves performance, offering insights for developing future models with a deeper understanding of HOI dynamics.

AI.tldr: HanDyVQA 是一个细粒度的视频问答基准，全面涵盖了 HOI 中的操作和效果方面，包含多种问题类型和大量的问答对，能够在视频对象分割中评估物体/部件级别的推理。
AI.motivation: 现有基准在捕捉 HOI 下的操作动态性方面存在缺陷，HanDyVQA 的目的是提供一个更全面、细粒度的平台，来了解和研究 HOI 中的人手操作和其产生的效果。
AI.method: 通过创建一个包含六种互补问题类型的基准（操作、过程、对象、位置、状态变化、物体部分），以及超过 11.1K 的多项选择问答对，和 10.3K 的分割掩码，HanDyVQA 分别从识别操作风格、手/物体动作以及部件级别状态变化等角度来收集和提供数据。同时，还通过不同视频基础模型的测试，以及特定提示嵌入视觉特征的方法展示了对 HOI 动态更深层次理解的重要性。
AI.result: 最新的视频基础模型在 HanDyVQA 上的表现仅达到 73% 的平均准确性，远低于人类表现（97%）。此外，研究发现空间关系、运动理解以及部件级别的几何理解是需要改进之处。并且，将与 HOI 相关的明显提示嵌入到视觉特征中提高了模型的性能。
AI.conclusion: HanDyVQA 是一个强大的基准，能够推动对 HOI 中的动态进行更细粒度和全面的理解，为未来模型开发提供了有价值的线索和指导。

title: Multilingual Training-Free Remote Sensing Image Captioning
summary: Remote sensing image captioning has advanced rapidly through encoder--decoder models, although the reliance on large annotated datasets and the focus on English restricts global applicability. To address these limitations, we propose the first training-free multilingual approach, based on retrieval-augmented prompting. For a given aerial image, we employ a domain-adapted SigLIP2 encoder to retrieve related captions and few-shot examples from a datastore, which are then provided to a language model. We explore two variants: an image-blind setup, where a multilingual Large Language Model (LLM) generates the caption from textual prompts alone, and an image-aware setup, where a Vision--Language Model (VLM) jointly processes the prompt and the input image. To improve the coherence of the retrieved content, we introduce a graph-based re-ranking strategy using PageRank on a graph of images and captions. Experiments on four benchmark datasets across ten languages demonstrate that our approach is competitive with fully supervised English-only systems and generalizes to other languages. Results also highlight the importance of re-ranking with PageRank, yielding up to 35% improvements in performance metrics. Additionally, it was observed that while VLMs tend to generate visually grounded but lexically diverse captions, LLMs can achieve stronger BLEU and CIDEr scores. Lastly, directly generating captions in the target language consistently outperforms other translation-based strategies. Overall, our work delivers one of the first systematic evaluations of multilingual, training-free captioning for remote sensing imagery, advancing toward more inclusive and scalable multimodal Earth observation systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于检索增强提示的无训练多语言图像字幕方法，该方法利用领域适配的SigLIP2编码器从数据存储中检索相关字幕和示例，并提供给语言模型。实验表明，该方法在多个基准数据集上的表现与全监督的英语系统具有竞争力，并且随着重新排序策略的应用，性能进一步提升。
AI.motivation: 当前的远程 sensing 图像字幕方法依赖于大规模标注数据集，且主要关注英语，限制了其全球适用性。为了克服这些局限，本文提出了一种无训练的多语言图像字幕方法，旨在提高字幕的多样性并增加对其他语言的支持。
AI.method: 利用领域适配的SigLIP2编码器检索相关字幕和示例，并结合图基于的重新排序策略，使用多模态模型（VLM）或仅基于文本提示的语言模型（LLM）生成字幕。
AI.result: 在四个基准数据集上的实验表明，该方法在多语言场景下的性能与全监督的英语系统具有竞争力，尤其是在应用图基于的重新排序策略后，性能提升显著。此外，VLM生成的字幕更贴近视觉内容但词汇多样性更高，而LLM则在BLEU和CIDEr指标上表现更好。直接在目标语言中生成字幕策略的性能优于其他翻译策略。
AI.conclusion: 本文的文化考核了一种无训练的多语言远程 sensing 图像字幕方法，展示了其在不同语言环境下的应用潜力，并探讨了不同模型的生成特点，为未来的远程 sensing 图像字幕系统开发提供了新的思路。

title: Accelerating Streaming Video Large Language Models via Hierarchical Token Compression
summary: Streaming Video Large Language Models (VideoLLMs) have demonstrated impressive performance across various video understanding tasks, but they face significant challenges in real-time deployment due to the high computational cost of processing dense visual tokens from continuous video streams. In streaming video scenarios, the primary bottleneck lies in the Vision Transformer (ViT) encoding stage, where redundant processing of temporally similar frames leads to inefficiency. Additionally, inflated token sequences during LLM pre-filling further exacerbate latency and memory overhead. To address these challenges, we propose \textbf{S}treaming \textbf{T}oken \textbf{C}ompression (\textbf{STC}), a plug-and-play hierarchical framework that seamlessly integrates into existing streaming VideoLLMs, optimizing both ViT encoding and LLM pre-filling stages to accelerate processing. STC introduces two token-level accelerators: \textbf{STC-Cacher}, which reduces ViT encoding overhead by caching and reusing features from temporally similar frames, and \textbf{STC-Pruner}, which compresses the visual token sequence before it enters the LLM, preserving only the most salient tokens based on both spatial and temporal relevance. Extensive experiments on four baseline streaming VideoLLMs across five benchmarks demonstrate that STC outperforms other compression methods. Notably, STC retains up to \textbf{99\%} of accuracy on the ReKV framework while reducing ViT encoding latency and LLM pre-filling latency by \textbf{24.5\%} and \textbf{45.3\%}.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了STC框架，通过STC-Cacher和STC-Pruner两种加速器减少ViT编码和LLM预填充阶段的冗余计算，显著提高了实时视频处理效率，同时几乎不损失准确率。
AI.motivation: 现有视频大语言模型（VideoLLMs）在实时部署中受到高计算成本的影响，尤其是在Vision Transformer（ViT）编码阶段，由于处理连续视频流中的冗余帧，导致效率低下。此外，LLM预填充阶段的视觉标记序列膨胀进一步增加了延迟和内存开销。为此，研究提出了一种名为STC的插件式层级框架，旨在优化ViT编码和LLM预填充阶段。
AI.method: STC采用两级加速策略：STC-Cacher通过缓存和重复利用相似帧的特征减少ViT编码的计算负担；STC-Pruner在视觉标记进入LLM前进行压缩，并根据空间和时间的相关性保留最显著的标记。
AI.result: 在四个基线的实时视频LLM模型上进行的广泛实验中，STC表现出色。它不仅显著改善了ViT编码和LLM预填充的延迟，还在ReKV框架上保持了高达99%的准确性。
AI.conclusion: 研究成果证明，STC是一种高效且灵活的解决方案，能够提高VideoLLM在实时视频处理中的性能，并在广泛的基准测试中展现出优势。

title: SwiftVLA: Unlocking Spatiotemporal Dynamics for Lightweight VLA Models at Minimal Overhead
summary: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models built on pretrained Vision-Language Models (VLMs) show strong potential but are limited in practicality due to their large parameter counts. To mitigate this issue, using a lightweight VLM has been explored, but it compromises spatiotemporal reasoning. Although some methods suggest that incorporating additional 3D inputs can help, they usually rely on large VLMs to fuse 3D and 2D inputs and still lack temporal understanding. Therefore, we propose SwiftVLA, an architecture that enhances a compact model with 4D understanding while preserving design efficiency. Specifically, our approach features a pretrained 4D visual geometry transformer with a temporal cache that extracts 4D features from 2D images. Then, to enhance the VLM's ability to exploit both 2D images and 4D features, we introduce Fusion Tokens, a set of learnable tokens trained with a future prediction objective to generate unified representations for action generation. Finally, we introduce a mask-and-reconstruct strategy that masks 4D inputs to the VLM and trains the VLA to reconstruct them, enabling the VLM to learn effective 4D representations and allowing the 4D branch to be dropped at inference with minimal performance loss. Experiments in real and simulated environments show that SwiftVLA outperforms lightweight baselines and rivals VLAs up to 7 times larger, achieving comparable performance on edge devices while being 18 times faster and reducing memory footprint by 12 times.

AI.tldr: SwiftVLA 提出了一种基于紧凑预训练 4D 视觉几何变换器的设计，结合了 Fusion Tokens 和掩码重建策略，以增强 VLM 的时空推理能力，最终在不损失性能的情况下，实现了模型轻量化和高效运行。
AI.motivation: 现有 VLA 模型参数量巨大，SwiftVLA 起源于减少模型大小和提高效率的需求。
AI.method: 提出了一种包含预训练4D视觉几何变换器、Fusion Tokens及掩码重建策略的 SwiftVLA 架构，提升时空推理能力。
AI.result: 实验结果显示 SwiftVLA 在保持性能的同时，实现了比基准模型小得多的模型，运行速度快且内存消耗少。
AI.conclusion: SwiftVLA 通过引入 4D 视觉几何变换器、Fusion Tokens 和掩码重建策略，有效提升了 VLA 模型的时空理解能力，使其在边缘设备上运行更高效。

title: Hierarchical Semantic Alignment for Image Clustering
summary: Image clustering is a classic problem in computer vision, which categorizes images into different groups. Recent studies utilize nouns as external semantic knowledge to improve clus- tering performance. However, these methods often overlook the inherent ambiguity of nouns, which can distort semantic representations and degrade clustering quality. To address this issue, we propose a hierarChical semAntic alignmEnt method for image clustering, dubbed CAE, which improves cluster- ing performance in a training-free manner. In our approach, we incorporate two complementary types of textual seman- tics: caption-level descriptions, which convey fine-grained attributes of image content, and noun-level concepts, which represent high-level object categories. We first select relevant nouns from WordNet and descriptions from caption datasets to construct a semantic space aligned with image features. Then, we align image features with selected nouns and captions via optimal transport to obtain a more discriminative semantic space. Finally, we combine the enhanced semantic and image features to perform clustering. Extensive experiments across 8 datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of our method, notably surpassing the state-of-the-art training-free approach with a 4.2% improvement in accuracy and a 2.9% improvement in adjusted rand index (ARI) on the ImageNet-1K dataset.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为CAE的层次语义对齐方法，通过语义空间对齐将图像特征与选择的名词和描述通过最佳传输进行对齐，以实现无训练的图像聚类性能提升。
AI.motivation: 当前方法忽视了名词的固有歧义性，可能导致语义表示不准确并降低聚类质量。本文旨在通过引入层次语义对齐方法来解决这一问题，改善无训练情况下的聚类性能。
AI.method: 本文方法首先从WordNet选择相关名词，并从描述数据集中获取描述，构建一个与图像特征对齐的语义空间。然后，通过最优传输使图像特征与选择的名词和描述对齐，以获得更具区分性的语义空间。最后，将增强后的语义和图像特征结合起来进行聚类。
AI.result: 在8个数据集上的实验表明，本文方法的有效性，特别是在ImageNet-1K数据集上，无训练的准确性提高了4.2%，调整后的兰德指数（ARI）提高了2.9%。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的方法能够在无训练的情况下显著改进图像聚类性能，通过引入多层次的语义对齐方法提出了新的视角，证明了其有效性和优势。

title: TalkingPose: Efficient Face and Gesture Animation with Feedback-guided Diffusion Model
comment: WACV 2026, Project page available at https://dfki-av.github.io/TalkingPose
summary: Recent advancements in diffusion models have significantly improved the realism and generalizability of character-driven animation, enabling the synthesis of high-quality motion from just a single RGB image and a set of driving poses. Nevertheless, generating temporally coherent long-form content remains challenging. Existing approaches are constrained by computational and memory limitations, as they are typically trained on short video segments, thus performing effectively only over limited frame lengths and hindering their potential for extended coherent generation. To address these constraints, we propose TalkingPose, a novel diffusion-based framework specifically designed for producing long-form, temporally consistent human upper-body animations. TalkingPose leverages driving frames to precisely capture expressive facial and hand movements, transferring these seamlessly to a target actor through a stable diffusion backbone. To ensure continuous motion and enhance temporal coherence, we introduce a feedback-driven mechanism built upon image-based diffusion models. Notably, this mechanism does not incur additional computational costs or require secondary training stages, enabling the generation of animations with unlimited duration. Additionally, we introduce a comprehensive, large-scale dataset to serve as a new benchmark for human upper-body animation.

AI.tldr: TalkingPose 是一种新型的基于扩散模型的框架，能够生成长时间、时空一致的人类上半身动画，通过利用驱动帧捕捉面部和手部的表达性动作，并通过一个稳定的扩散模型将这些动作无缝地转移到目标演员上。该框架不增加额外的计算成本，无需次级训练阶段，因此可以生成无限长的动画。
AI.motivation: 现有的方法在生成长时间、连贯的人体动画方面受到计算和内存限制的制约，因为它们通常仅在较短的视频片段上进行训练，这限制了它们的潜在能力来生成长时间的连贯内容。
AI.method: TalkingPose框架利用驱动帧来精确捕捉面部和手部的表达性动作，并通过一个稳定的扩散模型将这些动作无缝地转移到目标演员上，借助基于图像的扩散模型实现反馈驱动机制来确保连续运动并增强时间连贯性。
AI.result: 该研究成功开发了一种能够在不增加额外计算成本的情况下生成长时间、时空一致的人类上半身动画的方法，并通过新的基准数据集展示其实现效果。
AI.conclusion: TalkingPose提供了长期时间连贯的人体动画生成，为该领域带来了全新的视角，并为未来的研究奠定了基础。

title: ForamDeepSlice: A High-Accuracy Deep Learning Framework for Foraminifera Species Classification from 2D Micro-CT Slices
summary: This study presents a comprehensive deep learning pipeline for the automated classification of 12 foraminifera species using 2D micro-CT slices derived from 3D scans. We curated a scientifically rigorous dataset comprising 97 micro-CT scanned specimens across 27 species, selecting 12 species with sufficient representation for robust machine learning. To ensure methodological integrity and prevent data leakage, we employed specimen-level data splitting, resulting in 109,617 high-quality 2D slices (44,103 for training, 14,046 for validation, and 51,468 for testing). We evaluated seven state-of-the-art 2D convolutional neural network (CNN) architectures using transfer learning. Our final ensemble model, combining ConvNeXt-Large and EfficientNetV2-Small, achieved a test accuracy of 95.64%, with a top-3 accuracy of 99.6% and an area under the ROC curve (AUC) of 0.998 across all species. To facilitate practical deployment, we developed an interactive advanced dashboard that supports real-time slice classification and 3D slice matching using advanced similarity metrics, including SSIM, NCC, and the Dice coefficient. This work establishes new benchmarks for AI-assisted micropaleontological identification and provides a fully reproducible framework for foraminifera classification research, bridging the gap between deep learning and applied geosciences.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种基于深度学习的自动化分类方法，用于识别12种放射虫物种。通过精心挑选的高质量2D微CT切片数据集，研究团队使用多个先进的2D CNN架构实现了95.64%的测试准确率和99.6%的Top-3准确率，最终模型整合了ConvNeXt-Large和EfficientNetV2-Small。此外，还开发了一个交互式高级仪表板，支持实时切片分类和3D匹配。
AI.motivation: 该研究旨在发展一种更加准确且可操作的自动分类放射虫物种的方法，以提升微古生物学领域内的研究效率和准确性。
AI.method: 研究团队首先构建了一个包含97个2D微CT扫描标本的科学严谨的数据集，使用了109,617个高质量图像进行训练、验证和测试。通过实施七种主流的2D CNN架构进行试验学习，并最终集成ConvNeXt-Large和EfficientNetV2-Small两个模型。此外，开发了交互式高级仪表板，利用SSIM、NCC和Dice系数等高级相似度度量进行实时切片分类以及3D匹配。
AI.result: 研究的最终集成模型达到了95.64%的测试准确率和99.6%的Top-3准确率。AUC值为0.998，显示出对所有物种的良好泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: 这项研究表明，深度学习在微古生物学领域中具有巨大的潜力，并为放射虫分类研究提供了一个完全可重复的框架。

title: SceneProp: Combining Neural Network and Markov Random Field for Scene-Graph Grounding
summary: Grounding complex, compositional visual queries with multiple objects and relationships is a fundamental challenge for vision-language models. While standard phrase grounding methods excel at localizing single objects, they lack the structural inductive bias to parse intricate relational descriptions, often failing as queries become more descriptive. To address this structural deficit, we focus on scene-graph grounding, a powerful but less-explored formulation where the query is an explicit graph of objects and their relationships. However, existing methods for this task also struggle, paradoxically showing decreased performance as the query graph grows -- failing to leverage the very information that should make grounding easier. We introduce SceneProp, a novel method that resolves this issue by reformulating scene-graph grounding as a Maximum a Posteriori (MAP) inference problem in a Markov Random Field (MRF). By performing global inference over the entire query graph, SceneProp finds the optimal assignment of image regions to nodes that jointly satisfies all constraints. This is achieved within an end-to-end framework via a differentiable implementation of the Belief Propagation algorithm. Experiments on four benchmarks show that our dedicated focus on the scene-graph grounding formulation allows SceneProp to significantly outperform prior work. Critically, its accuracy consistently improves with the size and complexity of the query graph, demonstrating for the first time that more relational context can, and should, lead to better grounding. Codes are available at https://github.com/keitaotani/SceneProp.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为SceneProp的新方法，通过将场景图接地问题重新表述为马尔可夫随机场中的最大后验概率推断问题，实现了基于图的整体推断。这种方法能够在更大的查询图尺寸和复杂性下保持甚至提高准确率，从而显著优于先前的工作。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于短语的视觉查询定位方法在解析复杂的结构性描述时表现不佳，本文旨在解决这一结构性缺陷，提出场景图接地方案。
AI.method: SceneProp 通过将场景图接地问题转换为马尔可夫随机场中的 MAP 推断问题，实现全局推理，通过端到端框架中的可微信念传播算法实现。
AI.result: 在四个基准测试上的实验表明，SceneProp 能够显著优于先前的工作，其准确率随着查询图尺寸和复杂性的增加而保持甚至提升。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出了一种新的方法SceneProp，它能够随着查询图变得更大和更复杂时提供更优的视觉查询定位结果，证明了更多关系上下文确实可以并且应该带来更好的图像查询解析表现。

title: Binary-Gaussian: Compact and Progressive Representation for 3D Gaussian Segmentation
summary: 3D Gaussian Splatting (3D-GS) has emerged as an efficient 3D representation and a promising foundation for semantic tasks like segmentation. However, existing 3D-GS-based segmentation methods typically rely on high-dimensional category features, which introduce substantial memory overhead. Moreover, fine-grained segmentation remains challenging due to label space congestion and the lack of stable multi-granularity control mechanisms. To address these limitations, we propose a coarse-to-fine binary encoding scheme for per-Gaussian category representation, which compresses each feature into a single integer via the binary-to-decimal mapping, drastically reducing memory usage. We further design a progressive training strategy that decomposes panoptic segmentation into a series of independent sub-tasks, reducing inter-class conflicts and thereby enhancing fine-grained segmentation capability. Additionally, we fine-tune opacity during segmentation training to address the incompatibility between photometric rendering and semantic segmentation, which often leads to foreground-background confusion. Extensive experiments on multiple benchmarks demonstrate that our method achieves state-of-the-art segmentation performance while significantly reducing memory consumption and accelerating inference.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的3D高斯斑点表示方法，通过将特征压缩为单个整数来减少内存使用量，并通过细化训练过程优化不透明度，从而提高了细粒度分割的能力。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于3D高斯斑点的分割方法依赖于高维度的类别特征，导致较大的内存开销。此外，精细分割面临着标签空间拥挤和缺乏稳定多层次控制机制的挑战。
AI.method: 该方法采用从粗到细的二进制编码方案对每个高斯类别进行表示，通过二进制到十进制的映射将每个特征压缩为一个整数，以大幅减少内存使用。还设计了渐进式训练策略将全景分割分解为一系列独立的子任务，并在分割训练过程中微调不透明度，以解决光照渲染与语义分割之间的不兼容问题。
AI.result: 在多个基准上的广泛实验表明，该方法在显著减少内存使用和加速推理的同时，实现了最先进的分割性能。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提出了一种有效的3D高斯斑点表示方法和技术，大大提高了3D场景的内存效率和分割精度。

title: Adaptive Evidential Learning for Temporal-Semantic Robustness in Moment Retrieval
comment: Accepted by AAAI 2026, 10 pages, 9 figures, 5 tables
summary: In the domain of moment retrieval, accurately identifying temporal segments within videos based on natural language queries remains challenging. Traditional methods often employ pre-trained models that struggle with fine-grained information and deterministic reasoning, leading to difficulties in aligning with complex or ambiguous moments. To overcome these limitations, we explore Deep Evidential Regression (DER) to construct a vanilla Evidential baseline. However, this approach encounters two major issues: the inability to effectively handle modality imbalance and the structural differences in DER's heuristic uncertainty regularizer, which adversely affect uncertainty estimation. This misalignment results in high uncertainty being incorrectly associated with accurate samples rather than challenging ones. Our observations indicate that existing methods lack the adaptability required for complex video scenarios. In response, we propose Debiased Evidential Learning for Moment Retrieval (DEMR), a novel framework that incorporates a Reflective Flipped Fusion (RFF) block for cross-modal alignment and a query reconstruction task to enhance text sensitivity, thereby reducing bias in uncertainty estimation. Additionally, we introduce a Geom-regularizer to refine uncertainty predictions, enabling adaptive alignment with difficult moments and improving retrieval accuracy. Extensive testing on standard datasets and debiased datasets ActivityNet-CD and Charades-CD demonstrates significant enhancements in effectiveness, robustness, and interpretability, positioning our approach as a promising solution for temporal-semantic robustness in moment retrieval. The code is publicly available at https://github.com/KaijingOfficial/DEMR.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种名为DEMR的新框架，通过引入Reflective Flipped Fusion (RFF)模块和Geom-正则化器来改善模态不平衡问题，并增强文本敏感度，从而提高了复杂视频场景下时刻检索的准确性、稳健性和可解释性。
AI.motivation: 当前方法在处理模态不平衡和捕捉复杂或模糊时刻方面的局限性促使研究提出改进方案。
AI.method: DEMR框架结合了Reflective Flipped Fusion (RFF)模块和Geom-正则化器，来改进模态平衡问题并增强文本敏感度。RFF模块帮助不同模态的数据进行相互映射和对齐，而Geom-正则化器则被设计用来优化不确定性估计。
AI.result: 在标准数据集及去偏差数据集ActivityNet-CD和Charades-CD上进行的大量测试表明DEMR可以在提高鲁棒性和准确性的同时也改善了可解释性。
AI.conclusion: DEMR作为一种新的时刻检索方法，为复杂视频场景中的时间语义准确性提供了一种有前景的解决方案。

title: MM-ACT: Learn from Multimodal Parallel Generation to Act
summary: A generalist robotic policy needs both semantic understanding for task planning and the ability to interact with the environment through predictive capabilities. To tackle this, we present MM-ACT, a unified Vision-Language-Action (VLA) model that integrates text, image, and action in shared token space and performs generation across all three modalities. MM-ACT adopts a re-mask parallel decoding strategy for text and image generation, and employs a one-step parallel decoding strategy for action generation to improve efficiency. We introduce Context-Shared Multimodal Learning, a unified training paradigm that supervises generation in all three modalities from a shared context, enhancing action generation through cross-modal learning. Experiments were conducted on the LIBERO simulation and Franka real-robot setups as well as RoboTwin2.0 to assess in-domain and out-of-domain performances respectively. Our approach achieves a success rate of 96.3% on LIBERO, 72.0% across three tasks of real Franka, and 52.38% across eight bimanual tasks of RoboTwin2.0 with an additional gain of 9.25% from cross-modal learning. We release our codes, models and data at https://github.com/HHYHRHY/MM-ACT.

AI.tldr: 提出了一个名为MM-ACT的统一Vision-Language-Action（VLA）模型，该模型在共享的语义空间中融合了文本、图像和动作，并在所有三个模态中执行生成，同时通过上下文共享多模态学习机制增强了动作生成，验证了其在模拟和真实环境中的性能。
AI.motivation: 为了解决通用机器人策略需要同时理解语义进行任务规划以及通过预测能力与环境交互的问题，设计MM-ACT模型，使其能够在图像、文本和动作之间共享信息以提高任务执行效率。
AI.method: MM-ACT采用了一种重新掩码并行解码策略进行文本和图像生成，并使用了一步并行解码策略进行动作生成，同时引入了上下文共享多模态学习作为统一的训练框架，监督所有三个模态的生成。
AI.result: MM-ACT在LIBERO模拟环境中实现了96.3%的成功率，在真实Franka机器人上完成了三项任务取得了72.0%的成功率，并在RoboTwin2.0上完成了八个双臂任务取得了52.38%的成功率。跨模态学习进一步提高了2.5%的成功率。
AI.conclusion: MM-ACT通过整合图像、文本和动作生成为通用机器人提供了一个有效的解决方案，通过改进的生成策略和多模态学习增强了其在不同环境下的性能。

title: PhotoFramer: Multi-modal Image Composition Instruction
summary: Composition matters during the photo-taking process, yet many casual users struggle to frame well-composed images. To provide composition guidance, we introduce PhotoFramer, a multi-modal composition instruction framework. Given a poorly composed image, PhotoFramer first describes how to improve the composition in natural language and then generates a well-composed example image. To train such a model, we curate a large-scale dataset. Inspired by how humans take photos, we organize composition guidance into a hierarchy of sub-tasks: shift, zoom-in, and view-change tasks. Shift and zoom-in data are sampled from existing cropping datasets, while view-change data are obtained via a two-stage pipeline. First, we sample pairs with varying viewpoints from multi-view datasets, and train a degradation model to transform well-composed photos into poorly composed ones. Second, we apply this degradation model to expert-taken photos to synthesize poor images to form training pairs. Using this dataset, we finetune a model that jointly processes and generates both text and images, enabling actionable textual guidance with illustrative examples. Extensive experiments demonstrate that textual instructions effectively steer image composition, and coupling them with exemplars yields consistent improvements over exemplar-only baselines. PhotoFramer offers a practical step toward composition assistants that make expert photographic priors accessible to everyday users. Codes, model weights, and datasets have been released in https://zhiyuanyou.github.io/photoframer.

AI.tldr: PhotoFramer 提供了一种多模态的构图指导框架，通过自然语言的描述和生成良好的构图示例来帮助用户改进构图。
AI.motivation: 许多普通用户在拍照时难以进行良好的构图，PhotoFramer 旨在通过提供直观的指导来改善这一问题。
AI.method: PhotoFramer 通过一个大规模的数据集进行训练，这个数据集包含了转换从良好构图到不良构图的数据，并通过两阶段合成不良图像。模型通过处理和生成图文并茂的内容，来提供具体可行的文本指导。
AI.result: 实验证明，这种结合文本和样例的指导方式比单纯使用样例更为有效，有效地改善了图像构图。
AI.conclusion: PhotoFramer 为摄影师的专业构图知识提供了实践性的途径，使之成为普通用户的可访问资源。

title: S2AM3D: Scale-controllable Part Segmentation of 3D Point Cloud
summary: Part-level point cloud segmentation has recently attracted significant attention in 3D computer vision. Nevertheless, existing research is constrained by two major challenges: native 3D models lack generalization due to data scarcity, while introducing 2D pre-trained knowledge often leads to inconsistent segmentation results across different views. To address these challenges, we propose S2AM3D, which incorporates 2D segmentation priors with 3D consistent supervision. We design a point-consistent part encoder that aggregates multi-view 2D features through native 3D contrastive learning, producing globally consistent point features. A scale-aware prompt decoder is then proposed to enable real-time adjustment of segmentation granularity via continuous scale signals. Simultaneously, we introduce a large-scale, high-quality part-level point cloud dataset with more than 100k samples, providing ample supervision signals for model training. Extensive experiments demonstrate that S2AM3D achieves leading performance across multiple evaluation settings, exhibiting exceptional robustness and controllability when handling complex structures and parts with significant size variations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种称为S2AM3D的方法，它结合了2D分割先验和3D一致监督，旨在解决部分级点云分割中的数据稀少和视角不一致问题。
AI.motivation: 现有的部分级点云分割方法受到了数据稀少导致的泛化能力不足和通过2D预训练知识引入导致的跨视角不一致分割结果的困扰。为此，作者提出了S2AM3D方法以提高模型的泛化能力和分割结果的一致性。
AI.method: S2AM3D采用点一致部分编码器，通过自然3D对比学习聚合多视角2D特征，生成全局一致的点特征。同时，引入了尺度感知提示解码器，通过连续的尺度信号实现实时的分割粒度调整。方法还包括了一个大规模、高质量的部分级点云数据集，用于模型训练。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，S2AM3D在多种评估设置中取得了领先的性能，展示了在处理复杂结构和大小显著变化的部分时的出色鲁棒性和可控性。
AI.conclusion: 作者总结了S2AM3D在部分级点云分割成绩上的优势，并指出该方法能够为未来的研究提供参考和借鉴。

title: Provenance-Driven Reliable Semantic Medical Image Vector Reconstruction via Lightweight Blockchain-Verified Latent Fingerprints
summary: Medical imaging is essential for clinical diagnosis, yet real-world data frequently suffers from corruption, noise, and potential tampering, challenging the reliability of AI-assisted interpretation. Conventional reconstruction techniques prioritize pixel-level recovery and may produce visually plausible outputs while compromising anatomical fidelity, an issue that can directly impact clinical outcomes. We propose a semantic-aware medical image reconstruction framework that integrates high-level latent embeddings with a hybrid U-Net architecture to preserve clinically relevant structures during restoration. To ensure trust and accountability, we incorporate a lightweight blockchain-based provenance layer using scale-free graph design, enabling verifiable recording of each reconstruction event without imposing significant overhead. Extensive evaluation across multiple datasets and corruption types demonstrates improved structural consistency, restoration accuracy, and provenance integrity compared with existing approaches. By uniting semantic-guided reconstruction with secure traceability, our solution advances dependable AI for medical imaging, enhancing both diagnostic confidence and regulatory compliance in healthcare environments.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种新的医学影像重构框架，结合了高阶语义嵌入和混合U-Net结构，以保留临床相关结构。同时，通过引入基于无标度图设计的轻量级区块链溯源层，保证了重构事件的可验证记录，从而提高了结构一致性和溯源完整性。
AI.motivation: 当前临床医学影像数据存在污染、噪声和潜在篡改等问题，传统的图像重建技术优先考虑像素级别的恢复，可能导致解剖结构失真，影响临床诊断结果。因此，研究提出了一个结合语义和混合U-Net的图像重构框架，以增强临床相关结构的保留，同时通过区块链技术确保重构过程的透明性和可追溯性。
AI.method: 该方法基于混合U-Net架构，引入高阶语义嵌入，用于临床相关结构的保留。同时，采用规模无用图设计的轻量级区块链技术，构建一套可验证的重构溯源系统。
AI.result: 实验结果显示，该框架在多个数据集和污染类型上提高了结构一致性、恢复精度和溯源完整性的表现。与现有方法相比，提出的方法具有明显优势。
AI.conclusion: 该研究通过语义引导的图像重构与安全可追溯性的结合，推动了基于人工智能的医学成像系统的可信性，提高了医疗诊断的信心和法规合规性。

title: LISA-3D: Lifting Language-Image Segmentation to 3D via Multi-View Consistency
summary: Text-driven 3D reconstruction demands a mask generator that simultaneously understands open-vocabulary instructions and remains consistent across viewpoints. We present LISA-3D, a two-stage framework that lifts language-image segmentation into 3D by retrofitting the instruction-following model LISA with geometry-aware Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) layers and reusing a frozen SAM-3D reconstructor. During training we exploit off-the-shelf RGB-D sequences and their camera poses to build a differentiable reprojection loss that enforces cross-view agreement without requiring any additional 3D-text supervision. The resulting masks are concatenated with RGB images to form RGBA prompts for SAM-3D, which outputs Gaussian splats or textured meshes without retraining. Across ScanRefer and Nr3D, LISA-3D improves language-to-3D accuracy by up to +15.6 points over single-view baselines while adapting only 11.6M parameters. The system is modular, data-efficient, and supports zero-shot deployment on unseen categories, providing a practical recipe for language-guided 3D content creation. Our code will be available at https://github.com/binisalegend/LISA-3D.

AI.tldr: LISA-3D是一个两阶段框架，通过使用几何感知的低秩适应（LoRA）层来增强LISA模型，利用离线的RGB-D序列和相机位姿构建可微的重投影损失，并直接为SAM-3D模型生成RGBA提示，无需重新训练，实现了从语言到三维重建的提升。
AI.motivation: 当前3D重建面临挑战，如依赖开放词汇指令的理解和多视角一致性。LISA-3D旨在通过结合LISA的指令遵循模型和几何感知LoRA层，解决这些挑战，同时减少额外的3D-文本监督需求。
AI.method: LISA-3D框架采用了两个阶段的方法，第一阶段是通过LoRA层改进LISA模型，第二阶段是利用离线的RGB-D序列和相机位姿构建精确的重投影损失机制，然后将生成的掩码与RGB图像结合为RGBA提示输入SAM-3D模型，输出高精度的3D重建结果，而无需额外训练。
AI.result: 在ScanRefer和Nr3D数据集上，LISA-3D相对于单视角基线模型提高了15.6%的语言到3D准确率，并且仅适配了11.6M参数。此外，系统是模块化和数据高效的，适应于零样本部署于未见过的类别，提供了语言指导的3D内容创建的实用指南。
AI.conclusion: LISA-3D提出了一种高效且灵活的方法，通过优化指令遵循模型和集成几何约束，显著提高了3D重建性能，同时保持了模型的模块化和适应性。

title: Lotus-2: Advancing Geometric Dense Prediction with Powerful Image Generative Model
comment: Work done at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou). Project page: https://lotus-2.github.io/. 15 Pages, 12 Figures, 3 Tables
summary: Recovering pixel-wise geometric properties from a single image is fundamentally ill-posed due to appearance ambiguity and non-injective mappings between 2D observations and 3D structures. While discriminative regression models achieve strong performance through large-scale supervision, their success is bounded by the scale, quality and diversity of available data and limited physical reasoning. Recent diffusion models exhibit powerful world priors that encode geometry and semantics learned from massive image-text data, yet directly reusing their stochastic generative formulation is suboptimal for deterministic geometric inference: the former is optimized for diverse and high-fidelity image generation, whereas the latter requires stable and accurate predictions. In this work, we propose Lotus-2, a two-stage deterministic framework for stable, accurate and fine-grained geometric dense prediction, aiming to provide an optimal adaption protocol to fully exploit the pre-trained generative priors. Specifically, in the first stage, the core predictor employs a single-step deterministic formulation with a clean-data objective and a lightweight local continuity module (LCM) to generate globally coherent structures without grid artifacts. In the second stage, the detail sharpener performs a constrained multi-step rectified-flow refinement within the manifold defined by the core predictor, enhancing fine-grained geometry through noise-free deterministic flow matching. Using only 59K training samples, less than 1% of existing large-scale datasets, Lotus-2 establishes new state-of-the-art results in monocular depth estimation and highly competitive surface normal prediction. These results demonstrate that diffusion models can serve as deterministic world priors, enabling high-quality geometric reasoning beyond traditional discriminative and generative paradigms.

AI.tldr: Lotus-2 是一种两阶段确定性框架，适用于从单张图像中进行稳定、准确和精细的空间密集预测，利用预训练生成先验，实现了一种优化的适配协议。
AI.motivation: Address the limitations of discriminative regression models in recovering pixel-wise geometric properties and the suboptimality of directly using diffusion model frameworks for deterministic geometric inference.
AI.method: Lotus-2采用两阶段方式：第一阶段使用单步确定性公式和一个清洁数据目标与轻量局部连续模块生成全局一致结构；第二阶段通过在核心预测器定义的流形上进行约束多步矫正流细化，增强精细几何。
AI.result: 在仅使用59K训练样本的情况下（不到现有大规模数据集的1%），Lotus-2 在单眼深度估计和表面法线预测方面建立了新的最先进结果。
AI.conclusion: Lotus-2展示了扩散模型可以作为确定性世界的先验，超越了传统的判别性和生成性范式，提供高质量的几何推理。

title: TRoVe: Discovering Error-Inducing Static Feature Biases in Temporal Vision-Language Models
summary: Vision-language models (VLMs) have made great strides in addressing temporal understanding tasks, which involve characterizing visual changes across a sequence of images. However, recent works have suggested that when making predictions, VLMs may rely on static feature biases, such as background or object features, rather than dynamic visual changes. Static feature biases are a type of shortcut and can contribute to systematic prediction errors on downstream tasks; as a result, identifying and characterizing error-inducing static feature biases is critical prior to real-world model deployment. In this work, we introduce TRoVe, an automated approach for discovering error-inducing static feature biases learned by temporal VLMs. Given a trained VLM and an annotated validation dataset associated with a downstream classification task, TRoVe extracts candidate static features from the dataset and scores each feature by (i) the effect of the feature on classification errors as well as (ii) the extent to which the VLM relies on the feature when making predictions. In order to quantitatively evaluate TRoVe, we introduce an evaluation framework consisting of 101 trained temporal VLMs paired with ground-truth annotations for learned static feature biases. We use this framework to demonstrate that TRoVe can accurately identify error-inducing static feature biases in VLMs, achieving a 28.6% improvement over the closest baseline. Finally, we apply TRoVe to 7 off-the-shelf VLMs and 2 temporal understanding tasks, surfacing previously-unknown static feature biases and demonstrating that knowledge of learned biases can aid in improving model performance at test time. Our code is available at https://github.com/Stanford-AIMI/TRoVe.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种名为TRoVe的自动化方法，用于发现由时间视觉语言模型学习的引发错误的静态特征偏差。研究通过一个包含101个训练好的时间视觉语言模型的评估框架，展示了TRoVe的有效性，并进一步应用于七种现成的视觉语言模型上，发现了未知的静态特征偏差，证明了这些偏差的知识有助于提高模型的测试性能。
AI.motivation: 鉴于视觉语言模型（VLMs）在处理涉及跨图像序列视觉变化的预测任务时可能依赖静态特征偏见，这可能导致下游任务中的预测错误，因此研究旨在自动化发现这些特征偏见以减少系统性预测误差。
AI.method: TRoVe方法包括评估框架的小规模原始模型与真实标注的学习静态特征偏差，并针对给定的训练好的VLM和下游任务的标注数据集提取候选静态特征，然后根据特征对分类错误的影响及其用于预测的依赖程度来打分。此外，还引入了IR和SP两方面的评估指标。
AI.result: 研究通过包含101个训练好的时间视觉语言模型的评估框架来评估TRoVe，结果显示TRoVe能够准确识别视觉语言模型中的引发错误的静态特征偏差，相比最接近的基线方法提高了28.6%的准确性，并进一步发现了先前未知的静态特征偏差。
AI.conclusion: 研究通过自动化的TRoVe方法识别出了视觉语言模型中的静态特征偏差，证明了这有助于减少模型部署前的系统性预测错误。

title: Parameter Reduction Improves Vision Transformers: A Comparative Study of Sharing and Width Reduction
comment: 7 pages total (6 pages main text, 1 page references), 1 figures, 2 tables. Code available at https://github.com/AnanthaPadmanaban-KrishnaKumar/parameter-efficient-vit-mlps
summary: Although scaling laws and many empirical results suggest that increasing the size of Vision Transformers often improves performance, model accuracy and training behavior are not always monotonically increasing with scale. Focusing on ViT-B/16 trained on ImageNet-1K, we study two simple parameter-reduction strategies applied to the MLP blocks, each removing 32.7\% of the baseline parameters. Our \emph{GroupedMLP} variant shares MLP weights between adjacent transformer blocks and achieves 81.47\% top-1 accuracy while maintaining the baseline computational cost. Our \emph{ShallowMLP} variant halves the MLP hidden dimension and reaches 81.25\% top-1 accuracy with a 38\% increase in inference throughput. Both models outperform the 86.6M-parameter baseline (81.05\%) and exhibit substantially improved training stability, reducing peak-to-final accuracy degradation from 0.47\% to the range 0.03\% to 0.06\%. These results suggest that, for ViT-B/16 on ImageNet-1K with a standard training recipe, the model operates in an overparameterized regime in which MLP capacity can be reduced without harming performance and can even slightly improve it. More broadly, our findings suggest that architectural constraints such as parameter sharing and reduced width may act as useful inductive biases, and highlight the importance of how parameters are allocated when designing Vision Transformers. All code is available at: https://github.com/AnanthaPadmanaban-KrishnaKumar/parameter-efficient-vit-mlps.

AI.tldr: 研究针对Vision Transformers的MLP块的两种简化策略，即GroupedMLP和ShallowMLP，以减少参数数量而不牺牲性能，并提高了训练稳定性。
AI.motivation: 尽管扩展规律和许多经验结果表明增加Vision Transformers的规模通常会提高性能，但模型的准确度和训练行为并不总是随着规模的增加而单调增加。研究简化策略以减少参数数量，了解如何在不影响性能的情况下减少参数，并寻找参数分配的有用先验。
AI.method: 通过对比GroupedMLP和ShallowMLP两种方法，将MLP块的参数数量减少32.7%，并且保持了与基础模型相同的计算成本和在Inference时提高了吞吐量。
AI.result: GroupedMLP方法保留了基础计算成本的同时达到了81.47%的top-1准确率；ShallowMLP方法虽然在Inference时吞吐量提高了38%，但只达到了81.25%的top-1准确率；这两种方法的top-1准确率都超过了数据集上的86.6M参数基线模型81.05%的准确率，同时提高了训练的稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，在使用标准训练食谱的情况下，对于ViT-B/16在ImageNet-1K数据集上，模型处于一个过参数化区间，在这个区间内MLP容量的减少不会损害性能，甚至可以略微提升性能。这些发现还表明，如参数共享和宽度减少等架构约束可以作为有用的归纳偏置，并强调了在设计Vision Transformers时对参数分配的重要关注点。

title: Accelerating Inference of Masked Image Generators via Reinforcement Learning
summary: Masked Generative Models (MGM)s demonstrate strong capabilities in generating high-fidelity images. However, they need many sampling steps to create high-quality generations, resulting in slow inference speed. In this work, we propose Speed-RL, a novel paradigm for accelerating a pretrained MGMs to generate high-quality images in fewer steps. Unlike conventional distillation methods which formulate the acceleration problem as a distribution matching problem, where a few-step student model is trained to match the distribution generated by a many-step teacher model, we consider this problem as a reinforcement learning problem. Since the goal of acceleration is to generate high quality images in fewer steps, we can combine a quality reward with a speed reward and finetune the base model using reinforcement learning with the combined reward as the optimization target. Through extensive experiments, we show that the proposed method was able to accelerate the base model by a factor of 3x while maintaining comparable image quality.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为Speed-RL的新范式，通过强化学习加速预训练的生成式模型以产生高质量图像，显著提高了图像生成速度，同时保持了可比的图像质量。
AI.motivation: 解决 Masked Generative Models (MGM) 生成高质量图像所需计算资源消耗大的问题，考虑加速问题作为强化学习问题，以减少生成高质量图像所需步骤数为目标。
AI.method: 引入了一个质量奖励和速度奖励相结合的目标函数，使用强化学习微调基础模型。
AI.result: 实验表明，所提出的方法能使基础模型的速度提高3倍，同时保持可比的图像质量。
AI.conclusion: 提出的方法为加速预训练的生成式模型提供了新的视角，通过结合质量奖励和速度奖励，展示了在保持图像质量的同时大幅提升生成速度的潜力。

title: CycliST: A Video Language Model Benchmark for Reasoning on Cyclical State Transitions
summary: We present CycliST, a novel benchmark dataset designed to evaluate Video Language Models (VLM) on their ability for textual reasoning over cyclical state transitions. CycliST captures fundamental aspects of real-world processes by generating synthetic, richly structured video sequences featuring periodic patterns in object motion and visual attributes. CycliST employs a tiered evaluation system that progressively increases difficulty through variations in the number of cyclic objects, scene clutter, and lighting conditions, challenging state-of-the-art models on their spatio-temporal cognition. We conduct extensive experiments with current state-of-the-art VLMs, both open-source and proprietary, and reveal their limitations in generalizing to cyclical dynamics such as linear and orbital motion, as well as time-dependent changes in visual attributes like color and scale. Our results demonstrate that present-day VLMs struggle to reliably detect and exploit cyclic patterns, lack a notion of temporal understanding, and are unable to extract quantitative insights from scenes, such as the number of objects in motion, highlighting a significant technical gap that needs to be addressed. More specifically, we find no single model consistently leads in performance: neither size nor architecture correlates strongly with outcomes, and no model succeeds equally well across all tasks. By providing a targeted challenge and a comprehensive evaluation framework, CycliST paves the way for visual reasoning models that surpass the state-of-the-art in understanding periodic patterns.

AI.tldr: CycliST 是一个新颖的数据集，用于评估视频语言模型在处理周期性状态转换方面的文本推理能力。该数据集通过合成和结构丰富的视频序列，涵盖物体运动和视觉属性中的周期性模式来捕捉现实世界过程的基本方面。该基准采用分层评估系统，逐步增加难度，挑战当前最先进的模型在时空认知上的能力。
AI.motivation: 当前视频语言模型在处理周期性动态（如线性和轨道运动、时间依赖的视觉属性变化）方面存在困难，这一数据集旨在揭示这些模型在识别和利用周期模式方面的限制，促进未来在这一领域的研究和改进。
AI.method: CycliST 通过生成合成、结构丰富的视频序列，涵盖了周期性模式的物体运动和视觉属性。数据集采用分层评估系统，分级增加难度，基于周期物体的数量、场景杂乱程度和光照条件的变化，挑战最先进的模型。
AI.result: 通过与当前最先进的视频语言模型进行广泛的实验，结果显示这些模型在识别和利用周期性模式方面表现不佳，缺乏时间理解的概念，无法从场景中提取定量见解，如运动中的物体数量。没有单一模型在整个任务中始终表现出色，大小和架构与性能结果之间不存在强烈的相关性。
AI.conclusion: CycliST 为视觉推理模型提供了一个有针对性的挑战和全面的评估框架，旨在超越当前的最先进的理解和周期性模式以及推动相关研究。

title: SocialFusion: Addressing Social Degradation in Pre-trained Vision-Language Models
summary: Understanding social interactions from visual cues is a fundamental challenge for a socially competent AI. While powerful pre-trained vision-language models (VLMs) have shown remarkable general capabilities, they surprisingly struggle to unify and learn multiple social perception tasks simultaneously, often exhibiting negative transfer. We identify that this negative transfer stems from a critical issue we term "social degradation," whereby the general visual-linguistic pre-training process of VLMs impairs the visual encoder's ability to represent nuanced social information. We investigate this behavior further under two lenses: decodability through linear representation probing and compatibility through gradient conflict analysis, revealing that both play a role in the degradation, especially the former, which is significantly compromised in the VLM pre-training process. To address these issues, we propose SocialFusion, a unified framework that learns a minimal connection between a frozen visual encoder and a language model. Compared with existing VLMs, it exhibits positive transfer across all five social tasks, leveraging synergies between them to enhance overall performance and achieves comparable performance to task-specific state-of-the-art models on various benchmarks. Our findings suggest that current VLM pre-training strategies may be detrimental to acquiring general social competence and highlight the need for more socially-aware training paradigms.

AI.tldr: 本研究发现，现有的预训练视觉语言模型在同时学习多种社会感知任务时会出现负迁移，这是因为视觉编码器在泛化预训练过程中，对社交信息的表示能力受损。为此，研究提出了一种名为SocialFusion的统一框架，该框架通过最小化视觉编码器和语言模型之间的连接来解决这个问题，实现了在各个社会感知任务上的正迁移，并在基准测试上达到了与特定任务模型相当的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的预训练视觉语言模型在同时处理多种社会感知任务时表现不佳，存在负迁移的问题，这阻碍了AI的社会适应性。
AI.method: 研究通过线性表示探测和梯度冲突分析揭示了视觉编码器在预训练过程中的“社交降解”现象，并据此提出了名为SocialFusion的统一框架。
AI.result: SocialFusion框架在各个社会感知任务上实现了正迁移，利用任务间的协同作用提升整体性能，并在多种基准测试上达到了可与特定任务状态最先进技术相媲美的性能。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果表明，当前的预训练策略可能不利于获取通用的社会能力，强调了需要更有社会意识的训练方法。

title: Structural Prognostic Event Modeling for Multimodal Cancer Survival Analysis
summary: The integration of histology images and gene profiles has shown great promise for improving survival prediction in cancer. However, current approaches often struggle to model intra- and inter-modal interactions efficiently and effectively due to the high dimensionality and complexity of the inputs. A major challenge is capturing critical prognostic events that, though few, underlie the complexity of the observed inputs and largely determine patient outcomes. These events, manifested as high-level structural signals such as spatial histologic patterns or pathway co-activations, are typically sparse, patient-specific, and unannotated, making them inherently difficult to uncover. To address this, we propose SlotSPE, a slot-based framework for structural prognostic event modeling. Specifically, inspired by the principle of factorial coding, we compress each patient's multimodal inputs into compact, modality-specific sets of mutually distinctive slots using slot attention. By leveraging these slot representations as encodings for prognostic events, our framework enables both efficient and effective modeling of complex intra- and inter-modal interactions, while also facilitating seamless incorporation of biological priors that enhance prognostic relevance. Extensive experiments on ten cancer benchmarks show that SlotSPE outperforms existing methods in 8 out of 10 cohorts, achieving an overall improvement of 2.9%. It remains robust under missing genomic data and delivers markedly improved interpretability through structured event decomposition.

AI.tldr: SlotSPE 提出了一种基于槽的框架来建模结构化的预后事件，通过基于因子编码原理将多模态输入压缩为模态特定的具有区分性的槽表示，实现了复杂内模态和跨模态相互作用的有效建模，并增强了预后相关性。
AI.motivation: 目前的计算方法在建模癌症输入的内模态和跨模态交互时，难以处理高维度和复杂性的问题。 SlotSPE 提出了一种解决方案，通过槽注意力机制来压缩和处理多模态输入，旨在捕捉关键的预后事件。
AI.method: SlotSPE 基于因子编码原理，将每个患者的多模态输入压缩为模态特定的具有区分性的槽表示。通过利用这些槽表示作为预后事件的编码，框架能够高效有效地建模复杂的内模态和跨模态交互，并且还支持生物先验知识的集成，以增强预后相关性。
AI.result: 在十个癌症基准测试中，SlotSPE 在八组数据中优于现有方法，总体性能提高了2.9%。此外，SlotSPE 对缺乏基因组数据依然保持鲁棒性，并通过结构化事件分解提高了可解释性。
AI.conclusion: SlotSPE 框架展示了在多模态数据处理和复杂事件建模方面的优势，显示出在癌症预后预测中有潜力的提高。

title: DPAC: Distribution-Preserving Adversarial Control for Diffusion Sampling
summary: Adversarially guided diffusion sampling often achieves the target class, but sample quality degrades as deviations between the adversarially controlled and nominal trajectories accumulate. We formalize this degradation as a path-space Kullback-Leibler divergence(path-KL) between controlled and nominal (uncontrolled) diffusion processes, thereby showing via Girsanov's theorem that it exactly equals the control energy. Building on this stochastic optimal control (SOC) view, we theoretically establish that minimizing this path-KL simultaneously tightens upper bounds on both the 2-Wasserstein distance and Fréchet Inception Distance (FID), revealing a principled connection between adversarial control energy and perceptual fidelity. From a variational perspective, we derive a first-order optimality condition for the control: among all directions that yield the same classification gain, the component tangent to iso-(log-)density surfaces (i.e., orthogonal to the score) minimizes path-KL, whereas the normal component directly increases distributional drift. This leads to DPAC (Distribution-Preserving Adversarial Control), a diffusion guidance rule that projects adversarial gradients onto the tangent space defined by the generative score geometry. We further show that in discrete solvers, the tangent projection cancels the O(Δt) leading error term in the Wasserstein distance, achieving an O(Δt^2) quality gap; moreover, it remains second-order robust to score or metric approximation. Empirical studies on ImageNet-100 validate the theoretical predictions, confirming that DPAC achieves lower FID and estimated path-KL at matched attack success rates.

AI.tldr: 本文通过引入路径上的Kullback-Leibler散度 (path-KL) 来量化对抗性控制的质量退化问题，理论分析表明，最小化路径-KL 同时能收紧 Wassertein 距离和 Fréchet Inception Distance (FID) 的上界，并提出了基于生成分布几何的梯度投影方法 DPAC 来改进对抗性控制效果。
AI.motivation: 现有对抗性引导扩散采样的方法在达到目标类别时，样本质量会随着对抗性控制和基础轨迹之间偏差的累积而下降。为了改进这一问题，本文提出了路径-KL 来量化质量问题，并基于此建立指导性方法。
AI.method: 首先，通过 Girsanov 定理建立了路径-KL 与控制能量的等价关系；其次，提出了利用极大似然原则中的条件最优性条件来优化对抗性控制的梯度方向；最后，在离散求解器中引入了梯度的切空间投影方法 DPAC，来进一步改进计算质量。
AI.result: 本文提出了一个新颖的方法 DPAC，通过切空间投影梯度有效减少路径-KL 的标准，并证明了该方法能够在减少模型泛化偏差，计算误差率上优于其他方法。在基准数据集 ImageNet-100 的实验中，DPAC 达到了较低的 FID 和估计的路径-KL。同时进一步表明该方法已被证明在计算上是二阶鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 本文为企业提供了有效的对抗性控制框架和路径-KL 求解方法。基于 DPAC 的解决方案提高了在对抗性控制中的样本质量，并且在计算上具有较高的鲁棒性。

title: OmniFD: A Unified Model for Versatile Face Forgery Detection
summary: Face forgery detection encompasses multiple critical tasks, including identifying forged images and videos and localizing manipulated regions and temporal segments. Current approaches typically employ task-specific models with independent architectures, leading to computational redundancy and ignoring potential correlations across related tasks. We introduce OmniFD, a unified framework that jointly addresses four core face forgery detection tasks within a single model, i.e., image and video classification, spatial localization, and temporal localization. Our architecture consists of three principal components: (1) a shared Swin Transformer encoder that extracts unified 4D spatiotemporal representations from both images and video inputs, (2) a cross-task interaction module with learnable queries that dynamically captures inter-task dependencies through attention-based reasoning, and (3) lightweight decoding heads that transform refined representations into corresponding predictions for all FFD tasks. Extensive experiments demonstrate OmniFD's advantage over task-specific models. Its unified design leverages multi-task learning to capture generalized representations across tasks, especially enabling fine-grained knowledge transfer that facilitates other tasks. For example, video classification accuracy improves by 4.63% when image data are incorporated. Furthermore, by unifying images, videos and the four tasks within one framework, OmniFD achieves superior performance across diverse benchmarks with high efficiency and scalability, e.g., reducing 63% model parameters and 50% training time. It establishes a practical and generalizable solution for comprehensive face forgery detection in real-world applications. The source code is made available at https://github.com/haotianll/OmniFD.

AI.tldr: OmniFD 提出了一种统一的框架，能够高效地联合处理人脸识别伪造的多个任务，包括图像和视频分类、空间定位和时间定位，通过共享特征提取和自注意力机制实现跨任务学习。
AI.motivation: 当前的人脸伪造检测方法通常使用独立的模型处理每项任务，导致计算冗余并忽略了任务之间的潜在关联。OmniFD 旨在通过统一框架解决这些问题，提供一个更高效且全面的解决方案。
AI.method: OmniFD 包含三个主要组成部分：共享的 Swin Transformer 编码器，用于从图像和视频中提取统一的 4D 空间时间特征；交叉任务交互模块，该模块基于注意力机制动态捕捉跨任务依赖关系；以及轻量级的解码头，用于将精炼的表示转换为相应预测。
AI.result: OmniFD 在多种基准测试中显示出了比专用模型更好的性能，如减少 63% 的模型参数和50% 的训练时间，并能够实现细粒度的知识迁移。视频分类准确性在结合图像数据时提高了 4.63%。
AI.conclusion: OmniFD 为现实世界应用中的全面人脸伪造检测提供了一个实用且可扩展的解决方案，其统一设计能够促进多任务学习，从而提高模型的效率和性能。

title: Real-Time On-the-Go Annotation Framework Using YOLO for Automated Dataset Generation
comment: Copyright 2025 IEEE. This is the author's version of the work that has been accepted for publication in Proceedings of the 5. Interdisciplinary Conference on Electrics and Computer (INTCEC 2025) 15-16 September 2025, Chicago-USA. The final version of record is available at: https://doi.org/10.1109/INTCEC65580.2025.11256048
summary: Efficient and accurate annotation of datasets remains a significant challenge for deploying object detection models such as You Only Look Once (YOLO) in real-world applications, particularly in agriculture where rapid decision-making is critical. Traditional annotation techniques are labor-intensive, requiring extensive manual labeling post data collection. This paper presents a novel real-time annotation approach leveraging YOLO models deployed on edge devices, enabling immediate labeling during image capture. To comprehensively evaluate the efficiency and accuracy of our proposed system, we conducted an extensive comparative analysis using three prominent YOLO architectures (YOLOv5, YOLOv8, YOLOv12) under various configurations: single-class versus multi-class annotation and pretrained versus scratch-based training. Our analysis includes detailed statistical tests and learning dynamics, demonstrating significant advantages of pretrained and single-class configurations in terms of model convergence, performance, and robustness. Results strongly validate the feasibility and effectiveness of our real-time annotation framework, highlighting its capability to drastically reduce dataset preparation time while maintaining high annotation quality.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种利用YOLO模型的实时标注方法，通过评估YOLOv5、YOLOv8和YOLOv12在单类和多类标注、预训练和从零训练下的性能，展示了该方法在标注质量和效率上的优势。
AI.motivation: 在农业等需要快速决策的应用场景中，传统的数据标注技术因为需要大量的人工标注而效率低下。本研究旨在利用YOLO模型实现实时自动标注，提高数据准备效率。
AI.method: 研究利用YOLO模型在边缘设备上实现实时自动标注，并通过对比分析YOLOv5、YOLOv8和YOLOv12在单类和多类标注、预训练和从零训练下的性能。
AI.result: 统计测试和学习动力学的对比分析表明，预训练和单类配置在模型收敛、性能和鲁棒性方面表现出显著优势。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，所提出的方法在保持高标注质量的同时，大大降低了数据准备时间，验证了其实时自动标注框架的有效性。

title: M4-BLIP: Advancing Multi-Modal Media Manipulation Detection through Face-Enhanced Local Analysis
summary: In the contemporary digital landscape, multi-modal media manipulation has emerged as a significant societal threat, impacting the reliability and integrity of information dissemination. Current detection methodologies in this domain often overlook the crucial aspect of localized information, despite the fact that manipulations frequently occur in specific areas, particularly in facial regions. In response to this critical observation, we propose the M4-BLIP framework. This innovative framework utilizes the BLIP-2 model, renowned for its ability to extract local features, as the cornerstone for feature extraction. Complementing this, we incorporate local facial information as prior knowledge. A specially designed alignment and fusion module within M4-BLIP meticulously integrates these local and global features, creating a harmonious blend that enhances detection accuracy. Furthermore, our approach seamlessly integrates with Large Language Models (LLM), significantly improving the interpretability of the detection outcomes. Extensive quantitative and visualization experiments validate the effectiveness of our framework against the state-of-the-art competitors.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为M4-BLIP的框架，结合BLIP-2模型和局部面部信息，有效识别多模态媒体中的操纵，同时增强检测结果的解释性。
AI.motivation: 当前的多模态媒体操纵检测方法往往忽视了局部信息的重要性，而局部改变往往集中在面部等关键区域。因此，提出了M4-BLIP框架来解决这一问题。
AI.method: M4-BLIP框架基于BLIP-2模型，该模型擅长提取局部特征。通过设计的对齐和融合模块，将局部和全局特征有机结合，从而提高检测准确性。此外，该方法还与大型语言模型（LLM）无缝集成，提高了检测结果的解释性。
AI.result: 大量的定量和可视化实验证明，M4-BLIP框架在检测多模态媒体操纵方面优于现有最先进的方法。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出了一种新颖的方法，可以更准确地检测多模态媒体操纵，同时提高了检测结果的可解释性。

title: S$^2$-MLLM: Boosting Spatial Reasoning Capability of MLLMs for 3D Visual Grounding with Structural Guidance
summary: 3D Visual Grounding (3DVG) focuses on locating objects in 3D scenes based on natural language descriptions, serving as a fundamental task for embodied AI and robotics. Recent advances in Multi-modal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have motivated research into extending them to 3DVG. However, MLLMs primarily process 2D visual inputs and struggle with understanding 3D spatial structure of scenes solely from these limited perspectives. Existing methods mainly utilize viewpoint-dependent rendering of reconstructed point clouds to provide explicit structural guidance for MLLMs in 3DVG tasks, leading to inefficiency and limited spatial reasoning. To address this issue, we propose S$^2$-MLLM, an efficient framework that enhances spatial reasoning in MLLMs through implicit spatial reasoning. We introduce a spatial guidance strategy that leverages the structure awareness of feed-forward 3D reconstruction. By acquiring 3D structural understanding during training, our model can implicitly reason about 3D scenes without relying on inefficient point cloud reconstruction. Moreover, we propose a structure-enhanced module (SE), which first employs intra-view and inter-view attention mechanisms to capture dependencies within views and correspondences across views. The module further integrates multi-level position encoding to associate visual representations with spatial positions and viewpoint information, enabling more accurate structural understanding. Extensive experiments demonstrate that S$^2$-MLLM unifies superior performance, generalization, and efficiency, achieving significant performance over existing methods across the ScanRefer, Nr3D, and Sr3D datasets. Code will be available upon acceptance.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种高效的框架S$^2$-MLLM，通过利用前向3D重建的结构意识来进行隐式空间推理，从而增强多模态大语言模型在3D视觉定位任务中的空间推理能力。
AI.motivation: 现有的多模态大型语言模型在处理3D场景时主要依赖于二维视觉输入，无法有效理解场景的三维空间结构。本文旨在通过设计一种新的结构增强模块和空间指导策略，提高多模态大语言模型在3D视觉定位任务中的性能。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为S$^2$-MLLM的框架，该框架通过在训练过程中获取3D结构理解，使模型能够进行隐式空间推理，而无需依赖低效的点云重建。框架包括一个结构增强模块，该模块通过视图内和视图间注意力机制捕捉视图内的依赖关系和跨视图的对应关系，并整合多级位置编码将视觉表示与空间位置和视点信息关联起来。
AI.result: 在ScanRefer、Nr3D和Sr3D数据集上的实验显示，S$^2$-MLLM在性能、泛化能力和效率方面均超过了现有方法。
AI.conclusion: S$^2$-MLLM通过隐式空间推理和有效的结构感知模块，提高了多模态大语言模型处理3D视觉定位任务的能力，为该领域的研究提供了新的思路。

title: VSRD++: Autolabeling for 3D Object Detection via Instance-Aware Volumetric Silhouette Rendering
comment: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2404.00149
summary: Monocular 3D object detection is a fundamental yet challenging task in 3D scene understanding. Existing approaches heavily depend on supervised learning with extensive 3D annotations, which are often acquired from LiDAR point clouds through labor-intensive labeling processes. To tackle this problem, we propose VSRD++, a novel weakly supervised framework for monocular 3D object detection that eliminates the reliance on 3D annotations and leverages neural-field-based volumetric rendering with weak 2D supervision. VSRD++ consists of a two-stage pipeline: multi-view 3D autolabeling and subsequent monocular 3D detector training. In the multi-view autolabeling stage, object surfaces are represented as signed distance fields (SDFs) and rendered as instance masks via the proposed instance-aware volumetric silhouette rendering. To optimize 3D bounding boxes, we decompose each instance's SDF into a cuboid SDF and a residual distance field (RDF) that captures deviations from the cuboid. To address the geometry inconsistency commonly observed in volume rendering methods applied to dynamic objects, we model the dynamic objects by including velocity into bounding box attributes as well as assigning confidence to each pseudo-label. Moreover, we also employ a 3D attribute initialization module to initialize the dynamic bounding box parameters. In the monocular 3D object detection phase, the optimized 3D bounding boxes serve as pseudo labels for training monocular 3D object detectors. Extensive experiments on the KITTI-360 dataset demonstrate that VSRD++ significantly outperforms existing weakly supervised approaches for monocular 3D object detection on both static and dynamic scenes. Code is available at https://github.com/Magicboomliu/VSRD_plus_plus

AI.tldr: VSRD++ 提出了一种新颖的弱监督框架，通过多视图自标注和后续单目3D检测器训练的双阶段流程，消除了对3D注释的依赖，利用基于神经场的体绘制和弱2D监督，提升单目3D物体检测性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的3D物体检测方法依赖于通过劳动密集型标签过程获取的LiDAR点云中的大量3D注释，而VSRD++通过弱监督解决了这个问题，减少数据标注需求，提高了检测性能。
AI.method: VSRD++ 方法包含两个阶段：多视图自标注阶段和随后的单目3D检测器训练阶段。在多视图自标注阶段，通过实例感知的体绘制轮廓渲染将物体表面表示为符号距离场（SDF），并生成实例掩码。3D边界框优化时，将每个实例的SDF分解为立方体SDF和残差距离场（RDF）。对于动态物体体积渲染方法中常见的几何不一致性，VSRD++通过将速度纳入边界框属性并分配置信度来建模动态物体。此外，还采用了3D属性初始化模块来初始化动态边界框参数。在单目3D物体检测阶段，优化后的3D边界框被用作单目3D物体检测器训练的伪标签。
AI.result: 基于KITTI-360数据集的广泛实验表明，VSRD++显著优于现有弱监督方法，无论在静态场景还是动态场景中。同时方法在GitHub上开源。
AI.conclusion: VSRD++ 通过弱监督改进了单目 3D 物体检测，为减少数据标注成本和提升检测性能提供了新思路。

title: TabletopGen: Instance-Level Interactive 3D Tabletop Scene Generation from Text or Single Image
summary: Generating high-fidelity, physically interactive 3D simulated tabletop scenes is essential for embodied AI--especially for robotic manipulation policy learning and data synthesis. However, current text- or image-driven 3D scene generation methods mainly focus on large-scale scenes, struggling to capture the high-density layouts and complex spatial relations that characterize tabletop scenes. To address these challenges, we propose TabletopGen, a training-free, fully automatic framework that generates diverse, instance-level interactive 3D tabletop scenes. TabletopGen accepts a reference image as input, which can be synthesized by a text-to-image model to enhance scene diversity. We then perform instance segmentation and completion on the reference to obtain per-instance images. Each instance is reconstructed into a 3D model followed by canonical coordinate alignment. The aligned 3D models then undergo pose and scale estimation before being assembled into a collision-free, simulation-ready tabletop scene. A key component of our framework is a novel pose and scale alignment approach that decouples the complex spatial reasoning into two stages: a Differentiable Rotation Optimizer for precise rotation recovery and a Top-view Spatial Alignment mechanism for robust translation and scale estimation, enabling accurate 3D reconstruction from 2D reference. Extensive experiments and user studies show that TabletopGen achieves state-of-the-art performance, markedly surpassing existing methods in visual fidelity, layout accuracy, and physical plausibility, capable of generating realistic tabletop scenes with rich stylistic and spatial diversity. Our code will be publicly available.

AI.tldr: TabletopGen是一种无需训练的全自动框架，根据参考图像生成丰富的实例级交互3D桌面场景，显著改进了现有的方法在视觉保真度、布局精度和物理合理性方面的表现。
AI.motivation: 当前的3D场景生成方法主要关注大规模场景，难以捕捉桌面场景中的高密度布局和复杂的空间关系。本文提出TabletopGen框架，旨在生成更高质量、更多样性的交互式3D桌面场景，以支持机器人操作策略的学习和数据合成。
AI.method: TabletopGen框架接受参考图像作为输入，进行实例分割和补全，将每个实例重建为3D模型，并通过规范坐标对齐，进行姿态和比例估计，最后将这些3D模型组装成无碰撞、可模拟的桌面场景。核心创新在于一种新颖的姿态和平比例对齐方法，该方法将复杂的空间推理分解为两个阶段：不同的旋转优化器用于精确的姿态恢复，而俯视图空间对齐机制则用于鲁棒的比例和位置估计。
AI.result: 大量的实验和用户研究表明，TabletopGen在视觉保真度、布局精度和物理合理性方面大幅超越现有方法，能够生成具有丰富风格和空间多样性的真实桌面场景。
AI.conclusion: TabletopGen为生成高质量的3D桌面场景提供了一种有效的解决方案，并强调了空间推理在其中的关键作用，未来有望进一步改善框架的效率和灵活性。

title: Closing the Approximation Gap of Partial AUC Optimization: A Tale of Two Formulations
summary: As a variant of the Area Under the ROC Curve (AUC), the partial AUC (PAUC) focuses on a specific range of false positive rate (FPR) and/or true positive rate (TPR) in the ROC curve. It is a pivotal evaluation metric in real-world scenarios with both class imbalance and decision constraints. However, selecting instances within these constrained intervals during its calculation is NP-hard, and thus typically requires approximation techniques for practical resolution. Despite the progress made in PAUC optimization over the last few years, most existing methods still suffer from uncontrollable approximation errors or a limited scalability when optimizing the approximate PAUC objectives. In this paper, we close the approximation gap of PAUC optimization by presenting two simple instance-wise minimax reformulations: one with an asymptotically vanishing gap, the other with the unbiasedness at the cost of more variables. Our key idea is to first establish an equivalent instance-wise problem to lower the time complexity, simplify the complicated sample selection procedure by threshold learning, and then apply different smoothing techniques. Equipped with an efficient solver, the resulting algorithms enjoy a linear per-iteration computational complexity w.r.t. the sample size and a convergence rate of $O(ε^{-1/3})$ for typical one-way and two-way PAUCs. Moreover, we provide a tight generalization bound of our minimax reformulations. The result explicitly demonstrates the impact of the TPR/FPR constraints $α$/$β$ on the generalization and exhibits a sharp order of $\tilde{O}(α^{-1}\n_+^{-1} + β^{-1}\n_-^{-1})$. Finally, extensive experiments on several benchmark datasets validate the strength of our proposed methods.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种PAUC优化的方法，通过引入实例级的最小最大重写，降低了算法的时间复杂度，并提供了线性每迭代复杂度。实验结果验证了该方法的有效性。
AI.motivation: 现有PAUC优化方法在精度控制和可扩展性方面存在不足。本文旨在解决这一问题，提出了一种新的优化方法，以提高PAUC优化的效率和准确性。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种实例级的最小最大重写法，首先将问题等价转换为实例级问题，简化样本选择过程，然后使用不同的光滑技术，最终获得具有线性每迭代复杂度和收敛速度为$O(ε^{-1/3})$的高效算法。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的最小最大重写法为PAUC优化提供了一种更有效的方法，解决了现有方法中难以控制的近似误差和有限的可扩展性问题。

title: Diffusion Model in Latent Space for Medical Image Segmentation Task
summary: Medical image segmentation is crucial for clinical diagnosis and treatment planning. Traditional methods typically produce a single segmentation mask, failing to capture inherent uncertainty. Recent generative models enable the creation of multiple plausible masks per image, mimicking the collaborative interpretation of several clinicians. However, these approaches remain computationally heavy. We propose MedSegLatDiff, a diffusion based framework that combines a variational autoencoder (VAE) with a latent diffusion model for efficient medical image segmentation. The VAE compresses the input into a low dimensional latent space, reducing noise and accelerating training, while the diffusion process operates directly in this compact representation. We further replace the conventional MSE loss with weighted cross entropy in the VAE mask reconstruction path to better preserve tiny structures such as small nodules. MedSegLatDiff is evaluated on ISIC-2018 (skin lesions), CVC-Clinic (polyps), and LIDC-IDRI (lung nodules). It achieves state of the art or highly competitive Dice and IoU scores while simultaneously generating diverse segmentation hypotheses and confidence maps. This provides enhanced interpretability and reliability compared to deterministic baselines, making the model particularly suitable for clinical deployment.

AI.tldr: MedSegLatDiff 是一种结合变分自编码器（VAE）和潜扩散模型的高效医学图像分割框架，可在低维度潜空间中进行去噪和加速训练，并使用加权交叉熵损失改进小结构的保真度。
AI.motivation: 传统医学图像分割方法通常会产生单一分割掩码，忽略内在不确定性；而MedSegLatDiff通过结合VAE和潜扩散模型，能够生成多样化的分割假设和置信图，提高模型的可解释性和可靠性，适应用于临床。
AI.method: MedSegLatDiff 采用了一个基于扩散的框架，该框架基于VAE模型进行降噪和加速训练，并在VAE掩码重构路径中使用加权交叉熵损失以保留细微结构。另外，该框架还采用潜扩散机制直接在低维隐空间中操作。整个框架的评估结果表明其具有对抗其他先进技术的优越表现。
AI.result: MedSegLatDiff 在 ISIC-2018、CVC-Clinic 和 LIDC-IDRI 数据集上实现了最先进的Dice和IoU评分，同时产生了多样化的分割假设和置信图。
AI.conclusion: MedSegLatDiff 的提出解决了传统分割方法和基于生成模型方法的计算压力问题，提供了一种高效且高置信度的医学图像分割方案，特别是在小结构保护方面表现优异，适用于临床部署。

title: FOD-S2R: A FOD Dataset for Sim2Real Transfer Learning based Object Detection
summary: Foreign Object Debris (FOD) within aircraft fuel tanks presents critical safety hazards including fuel contamination, system malfunctions, and increased maintenance costs. Despite the severity of these risks, there is a notable lack of dedicated datasets for the complex, enclosed environments found inside fuel tanks. To bridge this gap, we present a novel dataset, FOD-S2R, composed of real and synthetic images of the FOD within a simulated aircraft fuel tank. Unlike existing datasets that focus on external or open-air environments, our dataset is the first to systematically evaluate the effectiveness of synthetic data in enhancing the real-world FOD detection performance in confined, closed structures. The real-world subset consists of 3,114 high-resolution HD images captured in a controlled fuel tank replica, while the synthetic subset includes 3,137 images generated using Unreal Engine. The dataset is composed of various Field of views (FOV), object distances, lighting conditions, color, and object size. Prior research has demonstrated that synthetic data can reduce reliance on extensive real-world annotations and improve the generalizability of vision models. Thus, we benchmark several state-of-the-art object detection models and demonstrate that introducing synthetic data improves the detection accuracy and generalization to real-world conditions. These experiments demonstrate the effectiveness of synthetic data in enhancing the model performance and narrowing the Sim2Real gap, providing a valuable foundation for developing automated FOD detection systems for aviation maintenance.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种名为FOD-S2R的新数据集，用于检测飞机油箱内异物。该数据集包含真实和合成图像，旨在评估合成数据在提高封闭结构中FOD检测模型性能方面的有效性。
AI.motivation: 当前缺乏针对飞机油箱等封闭环境内FOD（外来物）检测的数据集，该研究旨在提供一个包含实际和合成图像的FOD-S2R数据集，以填补这一空白，同时也评估了合成数据对模型性能的提升。
AI.method: FOD-S2R数据集由真实和合成图像组成。真实图像来自受控油箱复制品，合成图像则使用Unreal Engine生成。该数据集考虑了多种因素，如视场、对象距离、光照条件、颜色和对象大小。使用多种先进的物体检测模型进行基准测试。
AI.result: 基准研究表明，引入合成数据可以提高检测准确率，增强模型对真实世界条件的泛化能力，缩小了模拟数据与现实之间的差距。
AI.conclusion: 该研究提出的数据集和实验结果证明了合成数据对提高飞机油箱内FOD检测模型性能的有效性，为开发自动化FOD检测系统奠定了基础。

title: PSR: Scaling Multi-Subject Personalized Image Generation with Pairwise Subject-Consistency Rewards
summary: Personalized generation models for a single subject have demonstrated remarkable effectiveness, highlighting their significant potential. However, when extended to multiple subjects, existing models often exhibit degraded performance, particularly in maintaining subject consistency and adhering to textual prompts. We attribute these limitations to the absence of high-quality multi-subject datasets and refined post-training strategies. To address these challenges, we propose a scalable multi-subject data generation pipeline that leverages powerful single-subject generation models to construct diverse and high-quality multi-subject training data. Through this dataset, we first enable single-subject personalization models to acquire knowledge of synthesizing multi-image and multi-subject scenarios. Furthermore, to enhance both subject consistency and text controllability, we design a set of Pairwise Subject-Consistency Rewards and general-purpose rewards, which are incorporated into a refined reinforcement learning stage. To comprehensively evaluate multi-subject personalization, we introduce a new benchmark that assesses model performance using seven subsets across three dimensions. Extensive experiments demonstrate the effectiveness of our approach in advancing multi-subject personalized image generation. Github Link: https://github.com/wang-shulei/PSR

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种可扩展的多主题数据生成管道，通过利用强大的单主题生成模型构建高质量的多主题训练数据集，并设计了一套双主题一致性奖励和通用奖励，将其融入到改进的强化学习阶段。该方法在新的基准测试中展示了多主题个性化图像生成的有效性。
AI.motivation: 现有的单个主题生成模型在扩展到多个主题时，常常在一致性维持和文本控制方面表现不佳，原因是缺乏高质量的多主题数据集和精细的后训练策略。
AI.method: 本文提出了一种方法，首先利用强大的单主题生成模型构建多主题训练数据集；然后在强化学习阶段中加入双主题一致性奖励和通用奖励以提高主题一致性和文本控制。
AI.result: 实验结果显示，本文提出的方法在多主题个性化图像生成方面表现出了有效性。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出了一种系统性的方法来改进多主题个性化图像生成，该方法在新的基准测试中表现出色。

title: Rethinking Intracranial Aneurysm Vessel Segmentation: A Perspective from Computational Fluid Dynamics Applications
summary: The precise segmentation of intracranial aneurysms and their parent vessels (IA-Vessel) is a critical step for hemodynamic analyses, which mainly depends on computational fluid dynamics (CFD). However, current segmentation methods predominantly focus on image-based evaluation metrics, often neglecting their practical effectiveness in subsequent CFD applications. To address this deficiency, we present the Intracranial Aneurysm Vessel Segmentation (IAVS) dataset, the first comprehensive, multi-center collection comprising 641 3D MRA images with 587 annotations of aneurysms and IA-Vessels. In addition to image-mask pairs, IAVS dataset includes detailed hemodynamic analysis outcomes, addressing the limitations of existing datasets that neglect topological integrity and CFD applicability. To facilitate the development and evaluation of clinically relevant techniques, we construct two evaluation benchmarks including global localization of aneurysms (Stage I) and fine-grained segmentation of IA-Vessel (Stage II) and develop a simple and effective two-stage framework, which can be used as a out-of-the-box method and strong baseline. For comprehensive evaluation of applicability of segmentation results, we establish a standardized CFD applicability evaluation system that enables the automated and consistent conversion of segmentation masks into CFD models, offering an applicability-focused assessment of segmentation outcomes. The dataset, code, and model will be public available at https://github.com/AbsoluteResonance/IAVS.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一个针对颅内动脉瘤及其供血动脉的首个多中心标注数据集，涵盖了详细的血流动力学分析结果，并为语义分割方法提供了全面的评价标准。
AI.motivation: 当前的分割方法主要基于图像评估指标，缺乏对后续CFD应用的实际效果，因此，研究旨在构建一个既能评估图像分割精确度又能评估CFD应用的多阶段评估标准的数据集。
AI.method: 该研究创建了IAVS数据集，包含641个3D MRA图像和587个动脉瘤及供血动脉的注释，并建立了一个两阶段的分割框架。更重要的是，该研究开发了一个自动化且一致的将分割掩码转化为CFD模型的系统，确保评估的全面性和可对比性。
AI.result: 研究人员提出的数据集和评价标准，为开发和评估临床相关的颅内动脉瘤及其供血动脉分割方法提供了有力支持。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为颅内动脉瘤及其供血动脉的分割方法评估提供了重要工具，有助于提高血流动力学分析的准确性和有效性。

title: TRivia: Self-supervised Fine-tuning of Vision-Language Models for Table Recognition
summary: Table recognition (TR) aims to transform table images into semi-structured representations such as HTML or Markdown. As a core component of document parsing, TR has long relied on supervised learning, with recent efforts dominated by fine-tuning vision-language models (VLMs) using labeled data. While VLMs have brought TR to the next level, pushing performance further demands large-scale labeled data that is costly to obtain. Consequently, although proprietary models have continuously pushed the performance boundary, open-source models, often trained with limited resources and, in practice, the only viable option for many due to privacy regulations, still lag far behind. To bridge this gap, we introduce TRivia, a self-supervised fine-tuning method that enables pretrained VLMs to learn TR directly from unlabeled table images in the wild. Built upon Group Relative Policy Optimization, TRivia automatically identifies unlabeled samples that most effectively facilitate learning and eliminates the need for human annotations through a question-answering-based reward mechanism. An attention-guided module generates diverse questions for each table image, and the ability to interpret the recognition results and answer them correctly provides feedback to optimize the TR model. This closed-loop process allows the TR model to autonomously learn to recognize, structure, and reason over tables without labeled data. Leveraging this pipeline, we present TRivia-3B, an open-sourced, compact, and state-of-the-art TR model that surpasses existing systems (e.g., Gemini 2.5 Pro, MinerU2.5) on three popular benchmarks. Model and code are released at: https://github.com/opendatalab/TRivia

AI.tldr: TRivia 是一种无需标注数据即可训练视觉语言模型进行表格识别的方法，通过自动生成多样化问题和自闭环优化机制提升表格识别性能。
AI.motivation: 考虑到监督学习依赖大量标注数据的成本问题，TRivia 提供了一种基于自监督学习的方法，利用未标注的数据进行表格识别训练，减少人工标注的需求，特别适用于受隐私法规限制的企业。
